detailed_events.description: Luka Dončić (#77) drives into the paint and throws a lob pass over the defense to a cutting Jaxson Hayes (#11).
Jaxson Hayes (#11) receives an alley-oop pass from Luka Dončić and finishes with a two-handed dunk.
Luka Dončić (#77) drives into the paint against Jaden McDaniels (#3) and scores with a short turnaround jumper off the backboard.
Luka Dončić (#77) drives aggressively from the right wing into the paint and scores a contested layup off the glass.
Luka Dončić (#77 in white) drives into the paint from the right wing and successfully makes a layup while being defended.
Luka Dončić (#77 in white) executes a step-back move against Julius Randle (#30 in dark blue) and sinks a 3-point jump shot.
A replay shows Lakers #77 making a step-back jump shot from just inside the arc.
A Lakers player pokes the ball away from the Minnesota ball-handler from behind, causing a turnover.
Lakers #17 drives into the lane, draws the defense, and passes out to Lakers #77 on the right wing for a successful shot.
detailed_events.location: Pass from the paint to the right wing

detailed_events.description: After receiving a pass from a teammate, Lakers #77 takes and makes a deep catch-and-shoot 3-pointer.
After securing an offensive rebound, LeBron James (#23) passes the ball out to Luka Doncic (#77) on the left wing.
Luka Doncic (#77) catches the pass from LeBron James and immediately shoots a three-pointer from the left wing.
Luka Doncic (#77) dribbles against his defender, Julius Randle (#3), and pulls up for a contested fadeaway jumper from the right elbow.
Player #15 (Austin Reaves) passes the ball to player #77 (Luka Dončić) at the top of the three-point arc, leading to a made basket.
Player #77 (Luka Dončić) catches the ball and immediately shoots a three-pointer with a defender closing in.
Player #77 (Luka Dončić) drives towards the paint, performs a spin move, and hits a contested fadeaway jumper.
detailed_events.location: Right of the free-throw line, inside the arc

detailed_events.description: Player #30 (Stephen Curry) passes the ball from the top of the key to player #15 (Austin Reaves) on the left wing for an open shot.
Player #15 (Austin Reaves) catches the pass on the left wing and makes a three-point shot.
detailed_events.location: Left wing, beyond the three-point arc

detailed_events.description: The player in the white Lakers #77 jersey (Luka Dončić) takes one dribble at the top of the key and successfully makes a three-point shot.
The player in the white Lakers #77 jersey (Luka Dončić) drives from the right wing into the paint and scores with a running layup.
A Timberwolves player strips the ball from the player in the Lakers #30 jersey (Julius Randle) as he drives along the right baseline, causing the ball to go out of bounds for a Lakers turnover.
